Reviews.Content: hotel located nice antique rome called lido di ostia famous beach sea food regarding hotel please avoid okay quality price bad pay hotel meet expectations 2 star hotel 4 star hotel internet expensive swisscom provider food restaurant okay waste time outside hotel sea food restaurants

Reviews.Content: airways flight canceled vouchers stay eat 4star hotel 1015 minute ride via bus airport arrival staff courteous able answer questions despite language barrier paid unable successfully connect refund food fine told sit people didnt table fan family style dining huge deal smelled musky mirror covered mold huge turnoff bed fine bathroom overall experience ok

Reviews.Title: “Basic Place to Sleep”
Reviews.Author: Senior60+
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night close airport decent sleep night else located onehalf mile ocean overall look hotel getting little shabby adjacent bathroom clean staff helpful werent rude didnt provide information suggestions smile free breakfast adequate special wifi service expensive staff tried help unsuccessful calling internet service provider finally station lobby rate 035 euros minute airport shuttle service advertised overall ok sleep dont set expectations
